name: Improved Plane Shift
text: You’re an expert at traveling the various realms of the Great Beyond via plane shift.
benefit: Add plane shift to your spell list and to your spellbook as a 5th-level wizard spell. The time required for you to identify a portal’s destination is reduced to 1 round. In addition, you automatically identify any plane on which you arrive.
special: A wizard can select this as a wizard bonus feat.
text_zh: 你是一个通过异界传送（plane shift）在伟大彼岸（the Great Beyond）的各种国度间漫游的专家。
benefit_zh: 将异界传送（plane shift）作为5环法师法术增加至你的法术列表和你的法术书中。你识别一个门户的目的地所需要的时间被减少至1轮。此外，你可以自动识别你到达的任何位面。
normal_zh:
异界传送（Plane shift）是一个7环法师法术。

特别说明：法师可以以奖励专长选择该专长。
